summary: Innovative software engineer with 8 years in full-stack development, specializing in React and Node.js. Enhanced deployment times by 50%, boosted team productivity by 30%, and improved application performance by 40%.

bullets.text: Developed and maintained multiple web applications using React and Node.js, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement.
Led a team of 5 developers, increasing productivity by 30%.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 50%.
Built RESTful APIs using Express.js and MongoDB, supporting over 1 million requests per month.
Collaborated with product managers to define feature requirements, leading to a 15% reduction in feature delivery time.
Refactored legacy codebase improving performance by 40%.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
